title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.9 - Technology transfer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.9 - Technology transfer

State Regulations

The commissioner may share, as appropriate, technological
innovations developed as a result of this program with the food and agriculture
industry in the State. With respect to the licensing of patents which may arise
from the work completed under this program, the commissioner shall encourage
project sponsors to grant licenses to firms whose activities will give priority
to the development of the technology in such a way as to benefit the State's
food and agriculture industry. Notes

391.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
